attributes.action: place a limit on the number of onions allowed to be transported via plane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many nervous flyers and sufferers of aerial/aviation transport apnea have received no support whatsoever with regards their fear (undiplomatically deemed as irrational by the powers that be) of excess onion transportation and the threats posed to the safety of fellow passengers from the noxious gases released when the vegetables exposed to artificially pressurised cabins above 30,000 ft.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
